data.comment: Today's referee, Hiroki Kasahara, has blown to start the match.
Goal! Erik gives Yokohama Marinos a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 1, Theerathon Bunmathan with an assist there.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Tosu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 4, Junior Santos of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Tosu a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Tosu advance rapidly upfield but Hiroki Kasahara blows for offside.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tosu close to the penalty box.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 11, Yokohama Marinos are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
In the minute 13, Great finish from Junior Santos to give Yokohama Marinos a 0-2 lead.
Erik instrumental with a fine assist.
Tomoya Koyamatsu (Tosu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Tosu.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 18, In Tosu Yokohama Marinos attack through Takuya Kida. The finish is off target, however.
Tosu have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Daichi Hayashi puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Kaisei Ishii.
In the minute 24, Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos's Marcos Junior misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Tosu are coming forward and Tomoya Koyamatsu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 28, Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Goal! Yokohama Marinos extend their lead to 1-3 through Marcos Junior.
Great play from Kota Mizunuma to set up the goal.
In the minute 36, Hiroki Kasahara awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Tosu have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 38, Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos's Marcos Junior gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tosu defender.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Kaisei Ishii's header is off-target for Tosu.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
Kota Mizunuma for Yokohama Marinos has been booked by Hiroki Kasahara and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Tosu.
In the minute 45, Hiroki Kasahara awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Tosu.
In the minute 45, Tosu's Ryoya Morishita gets in a shot on goal at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Yokohama Marinos pushes forward through Kota Mizunuma, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 45, Hiroki Kasahara awards Tosu a goal kick.
The first-half is over at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
At Ekimae Real Estate Stadium, Takuya Wada has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The second-half is now underway.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Tosu's area.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Yuto Uchida with Ayumu Ohata. This is the first substitution made today by Myung Hwi Kim.
Throw-in Tosu.
In the minute 48, Tosu's Riki Harakawa breaks free at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Tosu's Daichi Hayashi is whistled for offside at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 49, Tosu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In Tosu Tosu's Daichi Hayashi is caught offside.
In the minute 55, Yuta Higuchi (Tosu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Yokohama Marinos's Marcos Junior gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Tosu's half.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 59, Kota Mizunuma gets his shot on target but fails to score for Yokohama Marinos.
Kota Mizunuma for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 60, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Erik for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Cho Dong-geon is on a sub for Daichi Hayashi for Tosu.
In the minute 62, Myung Hwi Kim is making the team's third substitution at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium with Ryang Yong-Gi replacing Jeong-su Park.
In the minute 63, Hiroki Kasahara awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Kota Mizunuma's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 66, Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Tosu.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 70, Tosu make their fourth substitution with Takeshi Kanamori replacing Kaisei Ishii.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Takeshi Kanamori for Tosu is whistled offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
The away team replace Takuya Wada with Takahiro Ogihara.
In the minute 74, Ryuta Koike is replacing Kota Mizunuma for the away team.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Tosu in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
The away team replace Marcos Junior with Daizen Maeda.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 80, Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Tosu.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 82, Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Fuchi Honda is on a sub for Tomoya Koyamatsu for Tosu.
Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 84, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tosu drive upfield and Fuchi Honda gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Yokohama Marinos defender.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Yokohama Marinos make their fourth substitution with Ado Onaiwu replacing Junior Santos.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a fifth substitution, with Eitaro Matsuda replacing Erik.
Ryuta Koike (Yokohama Marinos) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
